alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:16AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lincoln, southwestern Logan and southeastern McPherson Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 516 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ringgold, or near Tryon, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stapleton, Tryon, Gandy and Ringgold. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 201 and 235. Highway 97 between mile markers 18 and 35. Highway 83 between mile markers 96 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
